metadata.feature_description: Search posts by keywords, tags, and authors with advanced filtering options

steps.action: Navigate to News page with Publisher module
steps.expected: Publisher module with posts list displayed
steps.actual: News page loaded with Publisher module showing posts list

steps.action: Enter 'technology' in search box and submit
steps.expected: Posts containing 'technology' are filtered and displayed
steps.actual: 2 posts displayed: 'Tech News and Innovation' and 'First Test Post About Technology'

steps.action: Click on 'sports' tag in Tags filter
steps.expected: Only posts tagged with 'sports' are displayed
steps.actual: 1 post displayed: 'Sports News Update' with sports tag

steps.action: Navigate to News page with tags=sports,technology in URL
steps.expected: Posts with BOTH sports AND technology tags displayed, or no results if no posts have both tags
steps.actual: No posts displayed - shows 'No Search Result' message (no posts have both tags)

steps.action: Click on 'SuperUser Account' author in Authors filter
steps.expected: All posts by SuperUser Account displayed
steps.actual: 13 posts displayed, all by SuperUser Account author

steps.action: Apply author filter and tag filter together (author=SuperUser+tags=technology)
steps.expected: Posts matching both author AND tag criteria displayed
steps.actual: 2 posts displayed matching both SuperUser Account author and technology tag

steps.action: Navigate to News page without filters (base URL)
steps.expected: All posts displayed without any filtering
steps.actual: Full list of 13 posts displayed with 'Latest' header

steps.action: Search for 'xyznonexistent123' - a term with no matching posts
steps.actual: Page shows 'No Search Result' message in the filtered view

steps.action: Search for 'quotes' to find post with special characters in title
steps.expected: Post with special characters found and displayed correctly
steps.actual: Post 'Test Post with Special Chars: & "quotes" (c) (TM)' found and displayed with properly escaped characters

steps.action: Navigate to News page and check for Load More button
steps.expected: Load More button visible if posts exceed page size, or all posts displayed if within page size
steps.actual: All 13 posts displayed on page. No Load More button present because all posts fit within the default page size. Pagination would appear if more posts existed beyond the page limit.

observations: Date range filter: Code review (CardViewManager.js, FilterManager.cs) shows filtering is done via tags, author, and text search only. No explicit date range filter UI element found in Search.ascx or TagsFilter.ascx components.
Sorting: Posts are displayed in reverse chronological order by default (newest first). No explicit sort controls found in the UI - sorting is handled server-side in the API.
Multiple tags use AND logic: When filtering by multiple tags, posts must have ALL selected tags (not ANY), resulting in no results when combining unrelated tags like 'sports' and 'technology'.
URL-based filtering: Filter state is maintained via URL query parameters (?text=, ?tags=, ?author=), enabling deep linking and browser back/forward navigation.
Load More pagination: The code in List.ascx shows Load More is only rendered when PostList.Count() >= PageSize. With 13 posts and default page size likely >= 13, all posts fit on first page.
